sentences: Kes meist ei rõõmustaks, kui ilmub hea algupärane raamat kaasaegsetest!
Need autorid on kaasmaalased ja kaasaegsed.
Järelpõlved hindasid teda tema kaasaegsetest palju enam.
context: The word 'meiega' appears to be part of a larger word in Estonian. From the context provided, it seems to be used in the phrase 'kaasaegsetest', which translates to 'from contemporary people/things'. The 'meiega' component likely relates to 'with us' or 'among us', but in this specific usage within 'kaasaegsetest', it appears to be part of the plural instrumental case form, indicating that these are contemporaries living at the same time as us or among us.
